title: Google\Cloud\CertificateManager\V1\Certificate\SelfManagedCertificate
name: SelfManagedCertificate
description:
Certificate data for a SelfManaged Certificate.

SelfManaged Certificates are uploaded by the user. Updating such certificates before they expire remains the user's responsibility.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.certificatemanager.v1.Certificate.SelfManagedCertificate

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.pem_certificate
params.description: Input only. The PEM-encoded certificate chain. Leaf certificate comes first, followed by intermediate ones if any.

params.name: data.pem_private_key
params.description: Input only. The PEM-encoded private key of the leaf certificate.
